entities.description: Response indicating the use of dabbing waxes, shatter, or concentrates in the past year.
Response indicating the ingestion of marijuana through eating or drinking in the past year.
Response indicating the use of marijuana through some other mode in the past year.
Response indicating the use of drops, strips, lozenges, or sprays in the mouth in the past 12 months.
Response indicating the use of marijuana through lotions, creams, or patches on the skin in the past 12 months.
Response indicating the use of marijuana in pill form during the past 12 months.
Response indicating the use of marijuana through smoking in the past month.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent used dabbing waxes, shatter, or concentrates to consume marijuana in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent used eating or drinking methods to consume marijuana in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent used an unspecified or other mode to consume marijuana in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent used drops, strips, lozenges, or sprays in the mouth to consume marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used lotions, creams, or patches on the skin to consume marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used pills to consume marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used smoking to consume marijuana in the past month.
